body:

### Steps to reproduce

Not available

### Expected behavior

No heap-use-after-free

### Neovim version (nvim -v)

v0.9.0-dev-655+g08d5b4275

### Vim (not Nvim) behaves the same?

Unable to verify

### Operating system/version

Arch Linux

### Terminal name/version

kitty 0.26.5

### $TERM environment variable

xterm-kitty

### Installation

build from repo

comment_data.body: Closing as I don't remember how this happened and there is almost nothing that can be done about this.

labels.description: We need minimal steps to reproduce the issue
labels.name: needs:repro

labels.description: issue reporting a crash or segfault
labels.name: bug-crash

title: heap-use-after-free in garbage collection with EXITFREE
